attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to legalize cannabis because 
1. In 2005 there is 19 recorded deaths  in which cannabis was a factor however the LEGAL drug ALCOHOL claimed 6627 lives and was a factor in 27% of drug related deaths in 2005 alone. Source: tdpf.org.uk
2. There are proven pain relieving benefits to cannabis.
3. All people who smoke cannabis must either grow there own or buy from the black market, the government could tax cannabis, monitor its usage and put black market dealers out of business. 
4. The only way to stop black market dealers is to legalize cannabis, we will never stop smoking whether its illegal or not.
We live in a demoracy we have a right to put into our bodies what we like, smoking is a victimless crime

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
